Five Elders, Warrior God of Science and Defense, Saint Jaygarcia Saturn

Chapter Info

Volume:

108

Chapter:

1094

Japanese Title:

「五老星」科学防衛武神ジェイガルシア・サターン聖

Romanized Title:

"Gorōsei" Kagaku Bōei Bushin Jeigarushia Satān Sei

Viz Title:

Five Elders, Godhead of Science & Defense, St. Jaygarcia Saturn

Pages:

19

Release Date:

October 9, 2023

WSJ Issue:

2023 Issue 45

Anime:

Episode 1128 (p. 3-19)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →

Chapter 1094 is titled "Five Elders, Warrior God of Science and Defense, Saint Jaygarcia Saturn".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Trivia
  • 7 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Color Spread: Showcases most of the known members of the Shimotsuki Family as a promotion for Monsters: 103 Mercies Dragon Damnation.

Short Summary[]

The Pacifistas Mk III begin attacking the Marines, on Atlas' orders, while Sanji locates Bonney and goes to her aid. Kizaru leaves to eliminate Vegapunk, with Luffy in pursuit. St. Saturn takes action and orders the Pacifistas to stand down. Kizaru stops Vegapunk's group from escaping, but Luffy arrives and knocks him out just as Luffy reaches his own limit. Just as Saturn confronts Vegapunk's group, an angry Bonney stabs him.

Long Summary[]

Thanks to Atlas, the Pacifistas begin attacking the Marines. Dr. Vegapunk's group continue to make their way down to the Fabiriophase and Sanji detects Bonney's location. Immediately Sanji makes his way to her location as she gets attacked by a Vice Admiral. She pulls out a gun and uses a move called NDE (Near Death Experience) to trick the Marines attacking her to think that they have died when in reality the shock has knocked them out. Bonney makes a run for it but gets cornered by a Vice Admiral named Bluegrass, who has eaten the Nori Nori no Mi, which allows her to ride on and control whatever it is that she is riding. In this case, she is riding PX-III 046, which she uses on Bonney.

As PX-III 046 starts charging up, Bonney hesitates due to how it is a clone of her father. Thankfully Sanji gets her out of the way and tells her that she needs to accept that these clones are not him. He dodges the Vice Admiral that attacked Bonney earlier and brings her back to the Vegatank-08. Meanwhile on the Labophase, Kizaru and Luffy's battle continues with both of them having grown exhausted. Kizaru moves to attack Vegapunk but just as Luffy starts chasing him, the both of them, Zoro, Lucci, and Jinbe all get an uneasy feeling.

Their feeling ends up being justified as Saturn orders the Pacifistas to stop. When they do, it does not take long for Vegapunk and Atlas to realize who was responsible. Soon, what appears to be a magic circle forms on the ground and all Marines are informed that Saturn has arrived on the island. All lower-ranking officers, commodores and below, are ordered to not look directly at him as he appears from the circle having transformed into a large demonic spider hybrid; Saturn makes eye contact with one Marine who accidently looks at him and kills the Marine by telekinetically exploding his head.

While Sanji's group is distracted by Saturn's arrival, Kizaru destroys the cloud road they were using, causing them to fall. Luffy finally catches up to Kizaru and hits him in the side of his head using a move called Gomu Gomu no Star Gun, which even Kizaru realizes has hurt him badly. Unfortunately for Luffy, he has reached his limit with his form, and he changes back to normal and falls to the ground in a nearly unconscious state. The Vegatank-08 also hits the ground and breaks, but thankfully everyone within is okay.

As they pick themselves up, Saturn appears before them. Dr. Vegapunk recognizes Saturn, who tells Vegapunk that he should have been dead already. Bonney becomes filled with rage as thoughts about her father run through her head, and she grabs a nearby katana and stabs Saturn in the chest as tears flow from her eyes.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • The Pacifista Mk. III process Atlas' orders and begin attacking the Marines.
  • Bonney is found and attacked by some of the Vice Admirals but gets rescued by Sanji.
    • One of the unnamed Vice Admirals seems to have a Zoan that enables him to turn into a sea otter with sea otter-based attacks.
    • Vice Admiral Bluegrass is formally introduced, and she ate the Nori Nori no Mi.
    • Sanji and Bonney reunite with Vegapunk on the Vegatank-08 and try to return to the Labophase on a cloud road.
  • Saint Jaygarcia Saturn appears in Egghead from a summoning circle.
    • Saturn orders the Pacifista's to stand down.
    • Saturn is revealed to be an awakened Zoan user based on an unknown arachnid creature with horns.
    • It is revealed that only Marines ranked Rear Admiral and up are allowed to look at a member of the Five Elders, and anyone of lower rank is to be killed if they do.
  • Kizaru destroys the Vegatank-08 by cutting through its cloudy road with a laser.
    • Luffy manages to punch Kizaru away but falls to the ground in exhaustion ending their fight in a draw.
  • Saturn confronts Dr. Vegapunk, Atlas, Bonney, Sanji, and Franky.
    • Bonney angrily stabs Saturn in the chest with a katana.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


Sekai no Owari and Chilli Beans, thanks for the songs for the anime. Your music matches the art so well and makes each episode so satisfying.


セカオワ、チリビ、アニメの歌ありがとう！！絵にもハマって1話観る満足感が凄い。

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

Trivia[]

  • In the original magazine release, this chapter was titled "Gorōsei" Kagaku Bōei Bujin Jeigarushia Satān Sei (“五老星” 科学防衛武神ジェイガルシア・サターン聖?).

'''Chapter 1094''' is titled "Five Elders, Warrior God of Science and Defense, Saint Jaygarcia Saturn". 

==Cover Page==
[[Cover Page#Color Spread|Color Spread]]: Showcases most of the known members of the [[Shimotsuki Family]] as a promotion for ''[[Monsters: 103 Mercies Dragon Damnation]]''.

==Short Summary==
The [[Pacifista#Mark III|Pacifistas Mk III]] begin attacking the [[Marines]], on [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]]' orders, while [[Sanji]] locates [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] and goes to her aid. [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] leaves to eliminate [[Vegapunk]], with [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] in pursuit. [[Jaygarcia Saturn|St. Saturn]] takes action and orders the Pacifistas to stand down. Kizaru stops Vegapunk's group from escaping, but Luffy arrives and knocks him out just as Luffy reaches his own limit. Just as Saturn confronts Vegapunk's group, an angry Bonney stabs him.

==Long Summary==
Thanks to [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]], the [[Pacifista]]s begin attacking the [[Marines]]. [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk]]'s group continue to make their way down to the Fabiriophase and [[Sanji]] detects [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]]'s location. Immediately Sanji makes his way to her location as she gets attacked by a [[Pomsky|Vice Admiral]]. She pulls out a [[Firearm|gun]] and uses a move called '''[[Toshi Toshi no Mi#Techniques|NDE (Near Death Experience)]]''' to trick the Marines attacking her to think that they have died when in reality the shock has knocked them out. Bonney makes a run for it but gets cornered by a Vice Admiral named [[Bluegrass]], who has eaten the [[Nori Nori no Mi]], which allows her to ride on and control whatever it is that she is riding. In this case, she is riding PX-III 046, which she uses on Bonney.

As PX-III 046 starts charging up, Bonney hesitates due to how it is a [[Cloning|clone]] of her [[Bartholomew Kuma|father]]. Thankfully Sanji gets her out of the way and tells her that she needs to accept that these clones are not him. He dodges the Vice Admiral that attacked Bonney earlier and brings her back to the Vegatank-08. Meanwhile on the Labophase, [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] and [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]]'s battle continues with both of them having grown exhausted. Kizaru [[Pika Pika no Mi|moves]] to attack Vegapunk but just as Luffy starts chasing him, the both of them, [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]], [[Rob Lucci|Lucci]], and [[Jinbe]] all get an [[Haki/Observation Haki|uneasy feeling]].

Their feeling ends up being justified as [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]] orders the Pacifistas to stop. When they do, it does not take long for Vegapunk and Atlas to realize who was responsible. Soon, what appears to be a [[Abyss| magic circle]] forms on the ground and all Marines are informed that Saturn has arrived on the island. All lower-ranking officers, [[Marine Ranks#Commodore|commodores]] and below, are ordered to not look directly at him as he appears from the circle having transformed into a large demonic spider hybrid; Saturn makes eye contact with one Marine who accidently looks at him and kills the Marine by telekinetically [[Explosive|exploding]] his head.

While Sanji's group is distracted by Saturn's arrival, Kizaru destroys the [[cloud]] road they were using, causing them to fall. Luffy finally catches up to Kizaru and hits him in the side of his head using a move called '''[[Gomu Gomu no Mi/Gear 5 Techniques#Techniques|Gomu Gomu no Star Gun]]''', which even Kizaru realizes has hurt him badly. Unfortunately for Luffy, he has reached his limit with his form, and he changes back to normal and falls to the ground in a nearly unconscious state. The Vegatank-08 also hits the ground and breaks, but thankfully everyone within is okay.

As they pick themselves up, Saturn appears before them. Dr. Vegapunk recognizes Saturn, who tells Vegapunk that he should have been dead already. Bonney becomes filled with rage as thoughts about her father run through her head, and she grabs a nearby [[Sword#Katana|katana]] and stabs Saturn in the chest as tears flow from her eyes.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*The [[Pacifista|Pacifista Mk. III]] process [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]]' orders and begin attacking the [[Marines]].
*[[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] is found and attacked by some of the [[Vice Admiral]]s but gets rescued by [[Sanji]].
**One of the [[Pomsky|unnamed Vice Admirals]] seems to have a [[Zoan]] that enables him to turn into a sea otter with sea otter-based attacks.
**Vice Admiral [[Bluegrass]] is formally introduced, and she ate the [[Nori Nori no Mi]].
**Sanji and Bonney reunite with [[Vegapunk]] on the Vegatank-08 and try to return to the Labophase on a [[cloud]] road.
*Saint [[Jaygarcia Saturn]] appears in [[Egghead]] from [[Abyss|a summoning circle]].
**Saturn orders the Pacifista's to stand down.
**Saturn is revealed to be an [[Zoan#Awakening|awakened Zoan]] user based on an unknown arachnid creature with horns.
**It is revealed that only Marines ranked Rear Admiral and up are allowed to look at a member of the [[Five Elders]], and anyone of lower rank is to be killed if they do.
*[[Borsalino|Kizaru]] destroys the Vegatank-08 by cutting through its cloudy road with a [[Pika Pika no Mi|laser]].
**[[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] manages to punch Kizaru away but falls to the ground in exhaustion ending their fight in a draw.
*Saturn confronts Dr. Vegapunk, Atlas, Bonney, Sanji, and [[Franky]].
**Bonney angrily stabs Saturn in the chest with a [[Sword#Katana|katana]].
